title: Did Naik's factory workers in Vietnam earn 20 cents an hour?
subtitle: The critics of Colin Kaybernik's endorsement of a deal with Naik shared the virus claims about the wages and conditions of the company's factory workers.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Naik workers in Viet Nam earn 20 cents an hour, work 70 to 80 hours a week, and 80 per cent are female.
